article_text:
More and more hospitals are spending big bucks on robots to add efficiency and, in the long run, drive down costs. Here are a few in use by hospitals today. We will regularly update this gallery as we hear of others in use by healthcare providers.

Story: More hospitals investing in robots

Advance to next slide to start gallery
